name: Annoying Hamster
description:
Use your mouse to move your character. Your objective is to move all the hamsters back to the house by using your annoyingness.

This game was made for the Trijam #152. It was heavily inspired by one of Club Penguin's minigame: Puffle Roundup.

Controls:

Mouse moves the annoying hamster.

Pressing any button makes a horn sound (HONK!)
